game.name: Cursed Treasure Level Pack
game.description:
Cursed Treasure has marked a strong presence with a latest level pack! Are you interesting to play the role of a warrior again in this brand new adventure challenge? Join Cursed Treasure Level Pack and be prepared to play as an evil overlord! Your objective in this amazing tower defense game is to protect your gems from a horde of dangerous souls. Make sure to stop all the waves of enemies from entering your castle through your intense fighting skills. 

These deadly enemies want to grab all your gems that you have stored in your castle. Defend your treasures and castle by building towers through your special abilities. Face off all the enemy waves and try to save at least 1 gem to accomplish your mission in this war simulation game! Your primary objective is to build towers along the road and it will be easier for you to shoot at the enemies through the towers. Choose one or three towers on the panel to build a tower and then opt for selecting the empty tile on the level! 

Remember you can build den on grass, temple on rock and crypt on snow. There are multiple awesome upgradable towers, and 15 unique and challenging levels to play through. You can replay different levels to score higher and unlock various new abilities. Feel free to cast the spells that will also help you a lot in this amazing fighting game! Use the panel to cast the spells, and then move forward to point to the target location on the level! You have multiple tasks to do, including boosting towers, cutting trees and throwing meteor. Good luck to stand straight against all the monsters and undead and have fun without download!
